fields.label: Cortex Page Builder
fields.name: cortex_page_builder
fields.instructions: Drag as many page components as you need that can include blog posts, events, projects, portfolios, single video/audio embeds, buttons, calls to action, slide shows, WordPress Editors, WooCommerce Products, & more. Page Builder Documentation is also available.

sub_fields.label: Hero Content
sub_fields.name: hero_content
sub_fields.instructions: Select the layout for your Hero layout from the options below. Layouts with 2 columns can be inverted, and the Height of the section can be set for every layout. Custom backgrounds with videos, images, and patterns are available for all layouts.

sub_fields.label: Hero Heading
sub_fields.name: heading
sub_fields.instructions: Enter the main heading for the hero

sub_fields.label: Hero Sub Heading
sub_fields.name: sub_heading
sub_fields.instructions: Enter in a subheading if applicable

sub_fields.label: Hero Description
sub_fields.name: description
sub_fields.instructions: Enter in any type of content to be used as the description. Can include shortcodes.
sub_fields.default_value:
Nulla erat mi, maximus vitae eleifend bibendum, mollis id felis. Nunc tempus metus id ligula efficitur elementum. Vivamus tempor erat posuere sodales ullamcorper.

Video Lightbox YouTube Link

sub_fields.label: Hero Height
sub_fields.name: hero_height
sub_fields.instructions: Select how much height of the browser viewport you'd like the hero to take up

sub_fields.label: Hero Content Align
sub_fields.name: hero_content_align
sub_fields.instructions: Would you like the hero content to display to the left or right of the heading/subheading/description?

sub_fields.label: Video or Audio Embed Link
sub_fields.name: video_embed_link
sub_fields.instructions: Copy and paste the URL to any YouTube, Vimeo, or oEmbed supported link. To see a full list of supported embeds go here.

sub_fields.label: Hero Content Image
sub_fields.name: hero_content_image
sub_fields.instructions: Upload a hero image to be displayed to the right or left of the subheading/heading/description

sub_fields.label: Hero WP Editor
sub_fields.name: hero_wp_editor
sub_fields.instructions: Enter in any content to be displayed using the Wordpress Editor

sub_fields.label: Flex Slider Slides
sub_fields.name: gallery_photos
sub_fields.instructions: Upload images to be added to the Flex Slider hero. Images of the same height and width are recommended to prevent content from sliding up and down per slide.

sub_fields.label: Hero Background Type
sub_fields.name: hero_background_type
sub_fields.instructions: Select the type of background for your hero. Can be an image, video, pattern, or a solid color.

sub_fields.label: Hero Background Color
sub_fields.name: hero_background_color
sub_fields.instructions: Select the hero background color

sub_fields.label: Hero Background Image
sub_fields.name: hero_background_image
sub_fields.instructions: Select the background image. We recommend it be at least 2000px wide by whatever height best fits in your hero height of choice.

sub_fields.label: Hero Background Pattern
sub_fields.name: hero_background_pattern
sub_fields.instructions: Select the background pattern for your hero. Can be a transparent image used in tandem with a background color and will have an overlay to make the text easier to read

sub_fields.label: Hero Pattern Repeat?
sub_fields.name: hero_pattern_repeat
sub_fields.instructions: Select whether your background image should repeat vertically, horizontally, or both

sub_fields.label: Video Background Source
sub_fields.name: video_background_source
sub_fields.instructions: Will you be uploading your video files, embedding them from YouTube or Vimeo, or linking to external sources like Amazon S3?

sub_fields.label: Video Background Embed
sub_fields.name: video_background_embed
sub_fields.instructions: If you want to embed a youtube video as your background video you can enter the video ID and the Cortex theme will do the rest. The ID is everything in the link after https://www.youtube.com/watch?v= We recommend doing HD embeds since the video background will be full screen with an overlay. Videos will be automatically looped and muted.

sub_fields.label: Video Background Still Image
sub_fields.name: video_background_still_image
sub_fields.instructions: Make sure the image is at least 1920x1080 in height and width for fall back on mobile devices. (MInimum 1200px by 700px)

sub_fields.label: Video Background MP4 File
sub_fields.name: video_background_mp4_file
sub_fields.instructions: Attach the mp4 file for your video background

sub_fields.label: Video Background Webm File
sub_fields.name: video_background_webm_file
sub_fields.instructions: For the webm video file format

sub_fields.label: Video Background OGV File
sub_fields.name: video_background_ogg_file
sub_fields.instructions: Upload a OGV video file

sub_fields.label: Video Background MP4 File Link
sub_fields.name: video_background_mp4_file_link
sub_fields.instructions: Enter in the link to your mp4 file

sub_fields.label: Video Background Webm File Link
sub_fields.name: video_background_webm_file_link
sub_fields.instructions: For the webm video file format

sub_fields.label: Video Background OGV File Link
sub_fields.name: video_background_ogg_file_link
sub_fields.instructions: Link to external ogv video file

sub_fields.label: Display Overlay
sub_fields.name: display_overlay
sub_fields.instructions: Display the dark (or light) overlay behind your content to make the content easier to read over image or video backgrounds

sub_fields.label: Custom Class
sub_fields.name: custom_class
sub_fields.instructions: Label used to display in the backend and on the frontend for additional CSS customization for this section

sub_fields.label: Custom Background
sub_fields.name: custom_background
sub_fields.instructions: Select a background image, color, or pattern

sub_fields.label: Background Color
sub_fields.name: background_color
sub_fields.instructions: Select background color

sub_fields.label: Background Image
sub_fields.name: background_image
sub_fields.instructions: Recommended minimum 2000 pixels wide

sub_fields.label: Display Overlay
sub_fields.name: display_overlay
sub_fields.instructions: Display a semi-transparent dark overlay on top of the background image to make the content from the editor easier to read

sub_fields.label: Background Image Parallax
sub_fields.name: background_image_parallax
sub_fields.instructions: Show the background image with a parallax effect.

sub_fields.label: Background Pattern
sub_fields.name: background_pattern
sub_fields.instructions: Use a pattern as your background that repeats vertically, horizontally, or both

sub_fields.label: Background Pattern Repeat
sub_fields.name: background_pattern_repeat
sub_fields.instructions: Select whether your background image should repeat vertically, horizontally, or both

sub_fields.label: Section Width
sub_fields.name: section_width
sub_fields.instructions: Select the width of the content on the page. Defaults to full width on mobile and tablets.

sub_fields.label: Section Padding
sub_fields.name: custom_section_spacing
sub_fields.instructions: Select the amount of padding you'd like the section to have on the top and bottom of the content.

sub_fields.label: Custom Class
sub_fields.name: custom_class
sub_fields.instructions: Label used to display in the backend and on the frontend for additional CSS customization for this section

sub_fields.label: Width
sub_fields.name: width
sub_fields.instructions: Select fixed width to be the same width as the content of the site, or select full viewport to be the full browser width.

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: Attach the full width image. Recommend using an image that's at least 2000 pixels wide

sub_fields.label: Content
sub_fields.name: content
sub_fields.instructions: Enter any content you'd like to display over the full width image. Content will be vertically centered over the image with around 200px of padding on the top and bottom to accommodate the image. If you need more space to show more of the full width image, adjust the section padding in the option below, or insert a spacer short code using the editor buttons below.

sub_fields.label: Display Overlay
sub_fields.name: display_overlay
sub_fields.instructions: Put a semi-transparent full width/height overlay over the image to make the content over the image easier to read?

sub_fields.label: Custom Class
sub_fields.name: custom_class
sub_fields.instructions: Label used to display in the backend and on the frontend for additional CSS customization for this section

sub_fields.label: Slider Revolution
sub_fields.name: cortex_slider
sub_fields.instructions: Select which slider you'd like to display. Sliders can be made up of portfolio posts, or stand-alone individual image slides.

sub_fields.label: Width
sub_fields.name: width
sub_fields.instructions: How wide would you like the slider to be?

sub_fields.label: Slides
sub_fields.name: slides
sub_fields.instructions: Generate a simple slider using the flex slider with images and content

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: Attach your image to the slide. Make sure all slide images are the same width/height!

sub_fields.label: Content
sub_fields.name: content
sub_fields.instructions: Enter in the content for the slide if any

sub_fields.label: Link
sub_fields.name: link
sub_fields.instructions: Link this slide to a post or page?

sub_fields.label: External Link
sub_fields.name: external_link
sub_fields.instructions: Copy & paste the link

sub_fields.label: Custom Class
sub_fields.name: custom_class
sub_fields.instructions: Label used to display in the backend and on the frontend for additional CSS customization for this section

sub_fields.label: Posts Layout
sub_fields.name: c9_posts_layout
sub_fields.instructions: Sticky posts will always be full width.

sub_fields.label: Filter By Category
sub_fields.name: filter_by_category
sub_fields.instructions: Leave blank to show all post categories

sub_fields.label: Filter By Format
sub_fields.name: filter_by_format
sub_fields.instructions: Leave blank to show all post formats

sub_fields.label: Number of posts to display?
sub_fields.name: number_of_posts_to_display
sub_fields.instructions: In addition to sticky posts

sub_fields.label: Display Sidebar?
sub_fields.name: sidebar
sub_fields.instructions: Display a widgetized sidebar next to posts?

sub_fields.label: Select Sidebar
sub_fields.name: select_sidebar
sub_fields.instructions: Select a widget area to use for your sidebar

sub_fields.name: ajax_loading_on

sub_fields.name: view_more_button_link
sub_fields.instructions: Enter the link to your posts page

sub_fields.label: Custom Code
sub_fields.name: custom_code
